user.comment: Options: pro, max5x, max20x - Set this to your Claude subscription plan

weekly.comment: Weekly cost limits in USD for each plan tier. NOTE: pro and max5x limits are estimated/unverified - only max20x has been tested

limits.comment: Context limit (in thousands), cost limit per 5-hour session, token limit for tracking

paths.comment: Path to your Claude Code projects directory

display.comment: Display settings: progress bar length, lines to read from transcript, minutes for active session detection

colors.comment: ANSI color codes for statusline elements. Remove '1;' prefix for normal weight, add '1;' for bold (e.g., \033[1;31m)

layer1.comment: Layer 1: 0-30% usage. Color options: green, orange, red, pink, purple, cyan

layer2.comment: Layer 2: 30-50% usage. Color options: green, orange, red, pink, purple, cyan

layer3.comment: Layer 3: 50-100% usage. Color options: green, orange, red, pink, purple, cyan

multi_layer.comment: Thresholds define when color changes. Colors must match keys in 'colors' section. Scale multipliers auto-calculated.

layer1.comment: Layer 1: 0-14.29% of weekly limit (normal daily usage, 1/7 of weekly)

layer2.comment: Layer 2: 14.29-21.44% of weekly limit (exceeding daily usage, 1.5x expected). Shows overage status.

daily_layer.comment: Daily usage thresholds. Layer 1 = expected daily usage (1/7 weekly). Layer 2 = 1.5x daily limit for overage tracking. Multipliers auto-calculated.

sections.comment: Toggle visibility of statusline sections - set to false to hide any section. show_directory: project name (default on, bold bright orange). show_five_hour_window: 5-hour cost window ($X/$Y [bar] %). show_daily: daily cycle tracker. show_weekly: weekly percentage. show_timer: reset countdown. show_token_rate: current token burn rate (tokens/min). show_sessions: active session count.

tracking.comment: Weekly tracking: 'ccusage' (default, uses ISO weeks) or 'ccusage_r' (optional, matches Anthropic console schedule). To use ccusage_r: set official_reset_date from your console's 'Resets [date/time]' (format: 2025-10-08T15:00:00-07:00 for 'Oct 8, 3pm Vancouver'). weekly_baseline_percent compensates for untracked costs from deleted transcripts (clear/compact commands) - set to the percentage gap between your Anthropic console and statusline (e.g., console 15% vs statusline 10% â†’ set to 5). cache_duration_seconds controls how long ccusage_r results are cached (default: 300 = 5 minutes). See README for setup guide.
